about_the_game:
German Infantry Sprite Pack includes 38 new uniforms for various models of infantry for the German player.
  • Infantry / Anti-Tank 1936, 1938, 1940, 1944
  • Cavalry 1936, 1938, 1940, 1944
  • Artillery / Rocket Artillery 1936, 1938, 1940, 1944
  • Military Police 1936, 1939, 1942, 1945
  • Armoured Car 1936, 1944
  • Anti-Air 1936, 1940
  • Mountain Infantry 1936, 1942, 1944
  • Militia 1936, 1942, 1944
  • Marine-Infantry 1936, 1940
  • Paratrooper 1940, 1944
  • Partisan 1936
  • Engineer 1936, 1939, 1940, 1944
  • Self Propelled Artillery / Self Propelled Rocket Artillery 1940
  • HQ 1936
  • Garrison 1936

pc_requirements.minimum:
• Operating System: Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP/Vista
  • Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2.4 GHz or AMD 3500+ (quad core)
  • Memory: 2 GB of RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 2 GB
  • Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 or ATI Radeon X1900 videocard
  • Sound: Direct X-compatible sound card
  • DirectX®: Direct X 9.0
